item.title: By: yossi
item.dc:creator: yossi
item.description: Is there a book or essay that one could recommend as an introduction to Levinas for a person like myself who has read one or two of Levinas' essays but is not a professional philosopher. I did not understand what Levinas was saying and the few books I've tried to read about Levinas go over my head.
item.content:encoded: Is there a book or essay that one could recommend as an introduction to Levinas for a person like myself who has read one or two of Levinas’ essays but is not a professional philosopher. I did not understand what Levinas was saying and the few books I’ve tried to read about Levinas go over my head.
